name: Report templates in the forums
description: Adds quick shortcuts to the report page in the forums.

info.text: You can use a vertical bar | to make the cursor appear in that location after using the template.

default.name: Close as duplicate
default.text: This post is a duplicate of |. Could you close it?

default.name: Close as guide
default.text: This post is a guide, which are not allowed in the forums currently. Could you close it?

default.name: Close as spam
default.text: This post seems to be spam and serves no actual purpose. Could you close/dustbin it?

default.name: Remove as personal information
default.text: This post shows some personal information about the user. Could you remove it? It can be found in |.
